rules.name: PHI Use and Disclosure Restriction
rules.description: Restrictions on use and disclosure of Protected Health Information
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must not use or disclose PHI other than as permitted in the BAA, under the Privacy Rule, or as required by law.
exceptions: As permitted under Privacy Rule or required by law

rules.name: Administrative Safeguards
rules.description: Implementation of administrative safeguards for PHI protection
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must implement appropriate administrative safeguards including workforce training, privacy and security officials, and compliance policies.

rules.name: Technical and Physical Safeguards
rules.description: Implementation of technical and physical safeguards for PHI
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must implement appropriate technical and physical safeguards to protect confidentiality, integrity, and availability of PHI.

rules.name: Breach Notification Requirements
rules.description: Timely notification of breaches and security incidents
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must report to Covered Entity any unauthorized use/disclosure of PHI or security incidents within the specified breach notification period.
exceptions: Unsuccessful unauthorized access attempts may be reported periodically

rules.name: Subcontractor Agreement Requirements
rules.description: Requirements for subcontractor agreements handling PHI
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must ensure subcontractors execute written agreements with terms substantially similar to and no less stringent than the BAA before disclosing PHI.

rules.name: Compliance Assessments
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must conduct regular assessments of compliance with Privacy Rule and Security Rule obligations and make summaries available upon request.

rules.name: Individual Rights Support
rules.description: Support for individual HIPAA rights requests
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must support Covered Entity in completing individual rights requests (access, amendment, accounting) within 10 business days.
exceptions: Unless directed by Covered Entity or required by law

rules.name: HHS Access to Records
rules.description: Making records available to HHS for compliance determination
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must make books, records, and policies available to Secretary of HHS for determining HIPAA compliance.

rules.name: Covered Entity Audit Rights
rules.description: Covered Entity's right to audit Business Associate compliance
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must make books, records, and policies relating to BAA compliance available to Covered Entity upon reasonable request.
exceptions: Not required if it would interfere with confidentiality or legal obligations

rules.name: Mitigation Obligations
rules.description: Obligation to mitigate harmful effects of improper PHI use/disclosure
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must mitigate, to the extent practicable, any harmful effect of unauthorized use or disclosure of PHI and promptly communicate mitigation actions.

rules.name: PHI Retention and Destruction
rules.description: Requirements for PHI return or destruction upon termination
rules.rule_text: Upon termination, Business Associate must return or destroy all PHI at Covered Entity's discretion, retaining no copies unless directed or if return/destruction is infeasible.
exceptions: If return/destruction infeasible, must continue BAA compliance for retained PHI

rules.name: Security Incident Reimbursement
rules.description: Reimbursement for costs associated with Business Associate-caused incidents
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must reimburse Covered Entity for reasonable costs associated with security incidents caused by Business Associate or its subcontractors.

rules.name: Offshoring PHI Permission
rules.description: Permission to use and disclose PHI outside the United States
rules.rule_text: Business Associate may be permitted to use and disclose PHI outside of the United States to provide services, subject to any applicable limitations.

rules.name: De-identification Rights
rules.rule_text: Business Associate may be permitted to de-identify PHI according to HIPAA standards, subject to any applicable limitations.

rules.name: Aggregation Rights
rules.description: Rights to aggregate PHI for Business Associate's purposes
rules.rule_text: Business Associate may be permitted to aggregate PHI for its own purposes, subject to any applicable limitations.

rules.name: Termination for Material Breach
rules.description: Right to terminate BAA for uncured material breach
rules.rule_text: Either party may terminate the BAA if the other party fails to cure a material breach within 30 days after notice. Material breach of BAA is material breach of underlying agreement.

rules.name: Covered Entity Obligations
rules.description: Covered Entity's obligations to notify of privacy practices and restrictions
rules.rule_text: Covered Entity must notify Business Associate of privacy practices, changes in PHI use/disclosure, and individual restrictions that impact Business Associate's obligations.

rules.name: Subcontractor Due Diligence
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must conduct appropriate due diligence on all subcontractors who will handle PHI.

rules.name: Security Incident Confidentiality
rules.rule_text: Business Associate must not disclose information related to a security incident except as required by applicable law.
